text:
Sleep well, queen. I wish you the best
Message 584 of 4024
I spoke to Xfinity’s and they were in the phone with you, connected back with me and confirmed we were separate now and I have no access to your
account. If they told me something incorrect that’s on them. I have no access to alki or Bellevue. I am in a separate account.
The sleep number I have no idea how to work that. I gave you the remote.
I could not locate the tv remote in the house you indicated you saw. In fact I don’t know where any remotes to the tvs you dropped off are so they are
non functioning too.
I will also head to alki at some point likely in afternoon after Adrian’s game.
Sent:01/20/2024 at 06:32 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/20/2024 at 08:26 AM)
Subject:Re: Kirkland xfinity account
Message 585 of 4024
What a nice, non-confrontational note to wake to!
Agree on Xfinity. And as mentioned, if you are happy with the changes I requested I consider your work to be done. I’ll work with them on my
password issue..
No worries on bed. I was able to Bluetooth in with my phone. Good news is that I got your side blown up. Bad news is my side is busted. Not your
issue!
The TV remote is there somewhere. Just let me know if you find it. I ordered spares for you yesterday from Amazon. I’ll bring them to the game for
you!
Have an awesome day! Wont push my luck again!
Sent:01/20/2024 at 08:37 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/20/2024 at 09:45 AM)
Subject:Re: Kirkland xfinity account
Message 586 of 4024
If we need to connect before game you need to swap thoughts. I’ll be bringing you three Samsung universal remotes- living room, sitting room, our
bedroom. They will need batteries. In a pinch, AD usually has one or two hoarded away and then they have one in the man cave...
I will also bring you a decaf as usual. Let me know if you would like a 2/3 decaf instead. I’ve been enjoying that lately.
Adrian should be there 15 minutes early. So 12:45 if you don’t mind. It’s important for us both to set an example. Success is a habit
Sent:01/20/2024 at 11:47 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/20/2024 at 12:10 PM)
Subject:I’ll check OFW so no misunderstandings
